title: About
text:
Caution



This website is currently under construction ! The material is still being developped and some pages are missing.


Hello 👋 ! We are three students in the Master of Research in Economics of Sciences Po and this website is dedicated to our presentation of the article “…” for our class “Topics in Public and Environmental Economics” with Stefan Pollinger.
Feel free to contact us via our email address 😁 (“firstname.familyname@sciencespo.fr”) :

Marie Ange ORTIZ
Étienne COMPERAT (here his website)
Paulo GUGELMO CAVALHEIRO DIAS

title: The carbon footprint of capital
text:
Caution



This website is currently under construction ! The material is still being developped and some pages are missing.


Welcome to this website dedicated to the presentation of the working paper : Chancel L., Rehm Y., The Carbon Footprint of Capital: Evidence from France, Germany and the US based on Distributional Environmental Accounts, 2024. You can find the latest version of the paper here.
Here are some useful resources for a good understanding of the authors work :

Our presentation (here the Latex code)
A textual summary of the article

More coming soon !
